ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Greetings all
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I definitely want to try it.  I just dont want to come in to the game too late if it has been around too long.  Not sure when it is due out.  I would
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I definitely want to try it. I just dont want to come in to the game
too late if it has been around too long. Not sure when it is due out. I
would love to have my own space ship. Kind of like when I played UO and you
could have your own castle.

From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]

Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Greetings all


I think the star wars one will be...I might try it out...
